entry.title: WINTER STORM WARNING , Strathroy
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 7:00 PM EST Friday 03 March 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Thunderstorm with light snow, 0.2°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: London Int'l Airport 9:10 PM EST Friday 03 March 2023

Visibility: 2.8 km

entry.title: Friday night: Snow at times heavy and blowing snow. Low minus 1.
entry.summary: Snow at times heavy and blowing snow. Risk of a thunderstorm this evening. Amount 10 to 20 cm. Wind northeast 20 km/h gusting to 40. Low minus 1. Wind chill minus 8 overnight. Forecast issued 7:58 PM EST Friday 03 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Snow. High plus 4.
entry.summary: Snow ending in the morning then clearing. Wind north 30 km/h becoming light early in the afternoon. High plus 4. Wind chill minus 8 in the morning. UV index 4 or moderate. Forecast issued 7:58 PM EST Friday 03 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 3.
